item.description:
Join us as we try out a new location for our weekly gathering. This event will be an open game night (Strategy, Word, Card, Dice and/or Party games). We will leave it up to group choice on what we play that night. If necessary, we will divide into smaller groups depending on group size and game preferences.

As per the usual policy, we ask everyone to please purchase something from the restaurant so we may continue to support the businesses which provide us with public meeting locations.  

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group with games at their table(s).

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Open Game Night at The Tavern in the Square in Downtown Salem
